description.text: You can strike two adjacent foes with a single swing.

sections.Benefit: As a standard action, you can make a single attack at your full base attack bonus against a foe within reach. If you hit, you deal damage normally and can make an additional attack (using your full base attack bonus) against a foe that is adjacent to the first and also within reach. You can only make one additional attack per round with this feat. When you use this feat, you take a â€“2 penalty to your Armor Class until your next turn.
